structure.unit: C STATE AID TO LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT PROGRAMS

law.text:
The purpose of the supplementary state fund established in KRS 39C.010 and 39C.020 is to:
Assist local emergency management agencies established pursuant to KRS Chapters 39A to 39F to develop adequate comprehensive emergency management programs and disaster and emergency response capabilities;
Maintain and improve these agencies, programs, and capabilities through enhanced training, planning, staffing, administration, operations, and equipment acquisition; and
Benefit the Commonwealth as a whole, through creation of an effective and responsive statewide integrated emergency management system.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 42, effective July 15, 1998.
